title: [Product Hunt] BayesLab ⭐129
summary: For non-analysts seeking deep data analysis and beautiful slides. Our autonomous AI analyst handles cleaning, crunching, charting and storytelling within minutes. Then, rerun the entire analysis on new data instantly—same insights, zero effort.
